title: Club got STOLEN when the clubs went down last month :( I'm sad
body:
Hello Poro!

I'm having a huge issue with my club, and I contacted Riot Support but they are unwilling to forward it to the clubs team. I could copy-paste you my huge story about it that I sent to Riot already, but I don't want to waste your precious time ^^

Name of the Club: Onii-chans Little Sisters
Club Tag: Nyanâ„¢
Original Creator name: Kuroneko

In short; I created this club months ago, with a few 12~ people in it, then it disappeared some day (I thought), but later I found out some guy from the club still had the tag and I asked him HOW?! Apperently when a bug happened from riot's end, he claimed he was the only one left in the club somehow.

Here's some proof of him saying it was a bug or something:
 
http://puu.sh/szOL6/192264610a.jpg
http://puu.sh/szOPn/db5d2bf2a8.jpg


So, with a lot of back and forths, Riot Support claims, and I quote: "After further investigation it seems that "Input Username" is indeed the club creator- therefore I am unable to transfer ownership without his request."

Hearing this was sad, since I created the club, so how can Riot claim that HE created the club? I assume that when the clubs went down or something, he was the only one left in the club for some reason (I don't know this guy, just invited him cos he liked the club tag and I'm nice) All MY friends were kicked from the club at this time as well. So I think he RE-MADE the club somehow? I don't know, but according to Riot Support I'm NOT the original creator, which is just not true..

I'm sure you guys from the club team can see that the original creator was indeed me! "Kuroneko"


Riot Support is REAAALLY * me in the butt. You're my last hope, they keep lying to me. Claiming that I didn't create the club.

But look here:

https://puu.sh/rlsG5/5a4335d5a9.jpg


That icon was gifted on 23/09/16, and I was already in the club (see bottom left)

Riot is claiming someone ELSE made this club LATER after that, how is that possible? Riot Support is lying to me or there's a huge bug that happened. I'm very sad and frustrated since I'm a very sincere person and I keep getting shot down by everyone from Riot Games Support.

replies.body:
The Clubs issues that occurred over the last few months were certainly an inconvenience, and it looks like it was equally difficult for you. That being said, we aren't equipped to handle Clubs issues or disputes here on Help & Support, and I'd recommend reaching out in another [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you have more questions or concerns about the club.

I'm sorry I couldn't provide more context on the club issue you specifically encountered, but if you have any other questions, let me know.

Bro again:

"Hello,

I am sorry I have to repeat this, but I have investigated, and you were not the one that originally created this club."

Riot Support is a joke. This is the 4th time they tell me this bullshit, can you please pull some strings? These ppl don't read my ticket well enough or something, doesn't take a genius to figure out that I in fact created this club. I'm soooo pissed off. I can't stay calm anymore.

I appreciate the reply, but sadly Riot Support has made up their mind and starting ignoring my ticket. (it has been many days)

I made a 3rd one today, but they're too convinced of their database (which bugged out last month), and are unwilling to look at the facts I provide.

Thank's for understanding my frustration. I've seen Riot Porocles help people out with clubs in this thread: http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/oc7O5QIE-club-has-disappeared

Maybe you could message him about me, he didn't reply to my post in days either :(
